name: The Council of Gulls
description:
Behold this deeply cursed artefact of broken coding, retrieved from an abandoned nest on the outskirts of chernobyl...

Warning: All whom play this will one day succumb to their mortal demise.

Bodily functions, manoeuvre your feeble limbs fledgling! The council awaits:

Arrow keys or WASD

Design, writing and audio digitally restored by ShallowLagoon.
